Sentencas: Lanthanum strontium manganite (La1-xSrxMnO3, LSM) has been studied as a promising material for application as a cathode in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Influence of the synthesis method on the porosity, microstructure and electrical properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode materials

Sentencas: In the present work La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 nanopowders were synthesized by three different methods (combustion, citrate and solid-state) and characterized by thermal analysis, X-ray diffraction, physical adsorption of N-2 and scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Influence of the synthesis method on the porosity, microstructure and electrical properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode materials

Sentencas: All powders exhibited single LSM phase formation with crystallite sizes in the range of 12-20 nm.
Titulo: Influence of the synthesis method on the porosity, microstructure and electrical properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode materials

Sentencas: Nanopowders were sintered at 1100 degrees C to produce porous pellets.
Titulo: Influence of the synthesis method on the porosity, microstructure and electrical properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode materials

Sentencas: The porosity, particle size and microstructure of LSM sintered bodies are strongly dependent on the preparation methodology.
Titulo: Influence of the synthesis method on the porosity, microstructure and electrical properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode materials

Sentencas: The samples synthesized by combustion and citrate methods presented smaller particle sizes and higher porosity after sintering than that derived from solid-state synthesis.
Titulo: Influence of the synthesis method on the porosity, microstructure and electrical properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode materials

Sentencas: However, the electrical conductivity, measured by two-probe technique, was very similar for all three samples.
Titulo: Influence of the synthesis method on the porosity, microstructure and electrical properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode materials
